title: News media is “becoming part of AI systems”: Notes from the JournalismAI Festival 2025
description: London — Last month, fact checkers, newsroom leaders, product managers, and AI strategists gathered in the Southwark neighborhood of South London for the JournalismAI Festival 2025. The event brought out journalists from several continents to share their most innovative AI use cases, as well as deeper insights into how these technologies are impacting newsrooms globally....
